body: This is like the other "feral shizuku" djn with less sdm, i'll never understand why shizuko is portrayed like this smh

I suppose...I don't know, I was just going at someone being tied up and watching, I don't actually know the relationship of the characters or read japanese, so for all I know the tied up girl just has a voyeur kink and likes to be tied up, but thanks for clarifying

@Ravenleaf It may seem like it, but this isn't NTR. Kasumi is just handsy and close with Yuu they're aren't a couple either in the series or in this doujin. I guess shizuko is a bit jelly on their closeness
I could be wrong since I don't know this series at all, but it looks like it needs an NTR tag?
